title: Amazing townhomes you will not want to miss out on!
posting_body: ['Willow Point Townhomes', '8500 East Mississippi Ave, Denver, CO, 80247', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to Willow Point Townhomes!', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1586 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Willow Point Townhomes!', 'You will know that you have arrived home when you enter any one of our spacious 2 or 3 bedroom open floor plans.', 'Beautiful crown molding and quartz countertops, soft close cabinets and drawers, walk-in closets, and brand new appliances will give you the feeling of luxury you deserve.', 'Park your vehicle in an attached two-car garage or relax outside in your own gated outdoor area.', 'With an ideal location, our gated community is nestled perfectly between Beautiful Downtown Denver and Aurora.', 'With close proximity to some of the best shopping districts, dining, and nightlife will offer a convenience you cannot beat.', 'Come and see why you will want to reside with Willow Point Townhomes.', 'Features', '- Private patios/yards', '- 4 piece Master baths', '- Ceiling fans', '- Full size washer and dryer', '- Oversized shower', '- Private 2-story living', '- Central Air', "- 9' ceilings", '- Master suites', '- Dual pane windows', '- No neighbors above you', '- Stainless steel kitchen appliances', '- Kitchen pantries', '- Private entrances', '- walk in closets', '- Energy star appliances', '- Gourmet kitchens', '- Quartz countertops', '- 42" custom cabinets', 'Community Amenities', '- Community pool', '- Spa', '- Community dog wash', '- Playground', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We allow neutered/spayed cats and dogs, one year and older; no puppies or kittens allowed.', 'We allow two (2) pets per townhome maximum.', 'A refundable Pet Deposit in the amount of $250.00 per pet and a Non-Refundable Pet Fee of $250 per pet is required.', 'Monthly pet rent shall apply as follows: $30.00 for one pet / $50.00 for two pets.', 'Pet rent is subject to change.', 'We require evidence provided by a veterinarian of age, breed, weight of pet(s), that pet vaccinations are current and that the pet(s) is neutered or spayed.', 'Weight restriction (regardless of breed): eighty-five (85lbs) per animal.', "Prohibited Breeds: Dobermans, Pit Bull's and any Pit Bull mixes, American Staffordshire Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chows, Akitas, German Shepherds, Presa Canario, Cane Corso, Alaskan Malamutes, and Rottweilers will not be accepted.", 'Exotic pets will not be allowed.', 'These include, but are not limited to snakes, turtles, iguanas, ferrets, rodents, and rabbits.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'ctBUpz9Jb']
